img.title: hsa-toledo-slide3
img.div:
A culture that revolves around relationships with students,
families, and the community. So everyone is involved in
student success.

div.class: vc_general vc_tta vc_tta-tabs vc_tta-color-blue vc_tta-style-flat vc_tta-shape-square vc_tta-o-shape-group vc_tta-o-no-fill vc_tta-tabs-position-top vc_tta-controls-align-center vc_custom_1456382906670 vc_tta-tabs_style-1

div.a: See the full featured news archive

div.p: This is my daughter’s second year at Horizon Science Academy. This school is like no other. The environment is very clean, the teachers and staff are awesome, and their curriculum is great. My daughter is really being challenged at Horizon. I am so happy that I made the choice from public schools to charter especially here at Horizon.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1514752934603 vc_row-has-fill vc_video-bg-container

div.h2: Horizon Science Academy Toledo Charter School

div.p: Parents can apply to HSA Toledo online for all grades here.

a.class: stm-btn stm-btn_outline stm-btn_white stm-btn_md stm-btn_icon-right stm-btn_color_white

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: Horizon Science Academy Toledo is a public charter school serving Kindergarten through twelfth grades managing by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.

the 2019—20 academic year.

div.p: I send my daughter to Horizon Science Academy because of the safe environment and educational possibilities that this school offers.
This is my daughter’s second year at Horizon Science Academy. I am so happy that I made the choice from public schools to charter especially here at Horizon.
I love Horizon because it is justifying to know that my son is an excellent student, and his teachers think he is a joy to have in class.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs

div.span: Horizon Science Academy Toledo Charter School (K-12) is managed by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.

pum-container popmake theme-13498 pum-responsive pum-responsive-medium responsive size-medium

p.strong: As many of you have already learned, Governor DeWine extended the state-wide school shutdown through Friday, May 1st. As a result, the HSAT Administration is implementing our long-term instructional plan which will go into action officially on Monday, April 6th.
This plan will require daily participation of students, parents/guardians, and staff to ensure that all parties are complying to the Ohio Department of Education’s distance learning mandate.

strong.a: Click here to view our long-term instructional plan in response to the extended school closure.
